# Add Compatible Versions to a Game Center Enabled Version | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  Add Compatible Versions to a Game Center Enabled Version 

Web Service Endpoint# Add Compatible Versions to a Game Center Enabled Version

App Store Connect API 1.2–3.0DeprecatedDeprecated

This endpoint is deprecated.

## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#url)



```
POST https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterEnabledVersions/{id}/relationships/compatibleVersions
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#http-body)

`[GameCenterEnabledVersionCompatibleVersionsLinkagesRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterenabledversioncompatibleversionslinkagesrequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-gameCenterEnabledVersions-_id_-relationships-compatibleVersions#response-codes)

` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`
